name: #UntitledDrivingGame
description:
#UntitledDrivingGame blends together the fast paced action of combo based extreme sports games & the breakneck speeds of racing games to create a fresh, unique gameplay experience.

-- PLEASE NOTE! --

#UntitledDrivingGame is currently in PRE-ALPHA. I am actively looking for feedback to further develop the game into a full experience.

Synopsis

In #UntitledDrivingGame you are an amateur driver looking to join & work your way up the ladder in a local street crew.

After you're initiated into the crew, you'll move up by completing Odd Jobs for the boss & driving with a lot of style. Alexa, the crew's handler and the boss's right hand woman, will be the voice in your ear that keeps you on track as you work through your objectives.

Pre-Alpha Features

  • Two game modes: Odd Jobs (intro/tutorial mission) & Free Roam

  • Interactive tutorial mission that explains controls

  • Features vehicle ground, air, and grinding tricks for huge combos

  • 5 upbeat music tracks from various artists

  • Secrets menu (including unlockable preview level)

    • Secret Hints

      Secret codes are accepted as all lowercase and no spaces.

      First secret: Veehickle was my first game. I always ended the devlogs with...

      Second secret: Ali Baba and the Forty Thieves open the level by saying...

      Third secret: If your tires had a lot of glue on them, they'd be called...

    • Alternatively: complete the end tutorial survey to unlock the secret codes!

  • 3 vehicles (truck & wagon only available in secret preview level)

  • Endgame survey -- only shows once, please fill it out if you can! Thanks in advance.
